name: Dalia
body:
### Welcome to Dalia.
Named after [Dalia Mogahed](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dalia_Mogahed), the  famous American scholar of Egyptian origin. The project Dalia is built on Raspberry Pi with which a human can have meaningful and intelligent conversation. 

### Environment
Windows 10 IOT

### Support or Contact
You may contact me at saad[at]saadasharif[dot]com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
